channel.title: Latch Creative
channel.description: Latch Creative is a creative agency that builds awesome projects for awesome companies. We develop mobile apps, websites and more.

item.title: Step One
item.description:
Today is an exciting for Latch. We have finally submitted our first app to the app store.

Finally taking the first step and showing the world means a lot when youâ€™re first starting out. We thank everyone who has helped us along the way. We will update this post when we go live on the App Store.
